scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:up && npm run start
scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "npm run start:client"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:root && npm run install:server && npm run install:client
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd server && npm run lint" "cd client && npm run lint"
scripts.format: concurrently "cd server && npm run format" "cd client && npm run format"
